Text: I've been incredibly happy with this camera.  This camera is great if you're used to a high-end SLR.  It's overkill for simple snapshots, unless you've got way too much money to blow.  Exposure compensation in 1/3 stop increments (I leave it set on +1/3 stop to brighten up the default exposure, which goes a bit dark for my taste).  Slow-syncro flash, macro/infinity mode, etc.  The zoom range is a little narrow (35-70mm in 35mm film equivalent), but given that the camera is the same as my wallet, I can't think of any real complaint.  The SS body is wonderful, feels high-quality.
